longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 3 months beyond the period of intended stay.
 - British passports endorsed  British Citizen  or  British
   National (Overseas)  must be valid on arrival.
 - British passports endorsed  British Overseas Territories
   Citizen  issued to residents of Bermuda, must be valid on
   arrival.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British
   Citizen ; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British National
   (Overseas)"; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Territories Citizen , issued to residents of Bermuda; 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of a visa issued by Ireland (Rep.), USA, United Kingdom or a
Schengen Member State or not longer than the
expiry of the visa, if the validity of the visa is less than
30 days.
Minors:
- Children up to and including 14 years of age
  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Holders of tourist visas must also hold hotel vouchers. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
